system.effect: Generates power rather than using it. The Ship's Navigator can make +10 Perception Test on the bridge to modify mimicry to any vessel previously encounted via a bone-like node mounted on the bridge. The ship appears as that vessel to long-range sensors, although the illusion is broken once creacing visual contact.
